bug.short_desc: Twitter tutorial can not post via YQL

long_desc.thetext:
Something has quite likely changed in YQL (perhaps requirement to use OAuth??) such that the demo Twitter tutorial is not able to post to Twitter via YQL.
It would be nice if the Twitter tutorial could work properly as it provides a nice introduction to QX.
More details on the exact error in this forum thread: http://qooxdoo.678.n2.nabble.com/Hello-from-a-newbie-td5227706.html

Twitter is switching of the basic authentication this august [1] so we could not use it anymore. The only way posting messages is using OAuth which is way too much to include in such a small demo.
The idea is now to just redirect the user to the twitter page for posting and use the form we added for the user data of the feed listing.
[1] "OAuth is the Twitter preferred method of authentication moving forward - come August 2010, we'll be turning off Basic Auth from the API." http://apiwiki.twitter.com/Authentication
The tutoriual code and the tutorials in the manual for 1.2 should be ok now.
